name: Stahlregen - Growing Corals

shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=//warp = 0;
per_frame_2=dy = -0.004;
per_frame_3=rot = .002*sin(0.2*time);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`   // sample previous frame
warp_5=`ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, lerp(uv,uv_orig,.15)).xyz;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`ret.x += frac(GetPixel(uv+float2(2*rad,2)*texsize.zw*GetPixel(uv).x).x);
warp_8=`ret.x -= .9*GetBlur3(uv).x;
warp_9=`
warp_10=`//ret.y += frac(GetPixel(uv+float2(2,-2)*texsize.zw*GetPixel(uv).y).y);
warp_11=`//ret.y -= GetBlur3(uv).y;
warp_12=`ret.y = 0;
warp_13=`//ret.z += frac(GetPixel(uv+float2(-2,-1)*texsize.zw*GetPixel(uv).z).z);
warp_14=`//ret.z -= GetBlur3(uv).z;
warp_15=`ret.z = 0;
warp_16=`
warp_17=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_18=`    ret = (ret*0.98)-.002; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_19=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`   // ret *= 2.00; //gamma
comp_5=`   ret.yz = 0;
comp_6=`   ret.z += lerp(0,.5,lerp(0,ret.x,1-uv.y));
comp_7=`}
